thread.title: Shia LaBeouf is in trouble again after being arrested for public intoxication - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf is in trouble again after being arrested for public intoxication - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Shia LaBeouf is in trouble again after being arrested for public intoxication - Showbiz
text: Shia LaBeouf was arrested on Friday night (October 9) in Austin for public intoxication.The star, who was thought to be in town for the Austin City Limits music festival, was arrested in the city's downtown bar area. © INFphoto.com Lieutenant Ryan Moon with the Austin Police Department told The Hollywood Reporter that LaBeouf was arrested shortly after 7.30pm before he was later released.Shia Labeouf just got arrested outside my bar lol pic.twitter.com/mYFoWx05Hf— Kelsie Nugent (@kelsie_rae) October 10, 2015It is not the first time the Transformers star has had trouble with the law.LaBeouf was arrested in New York last year after causing a disturbance at the Studio 54 theatre while watching the Cabaret musical.He was later ordered to complete six months in an outpatient alcohol treatment centre as part of a plea deal.Following a period of erratic behaviour last year, the actor claimed he was going through "an existential crisis".
